layer.name: floorbbg
layer.onclick: if(status==0, set(status, 1); stopdelayedcall(fbsub); tween(alpha,0.9,0.5); set(layer[floorbbarcon].visible,true);, set(status, 0); delayedcall(fbout, 0.1, tween(alpha,0.5,0.5); set(layer[floorbbarcon].visible,false); highlightedbar(get(currentfloor),get(currentroom));); highlightedbar(get(currentfloor),get(currentroom));)

layer.name: scrollsliderg
layer.dragging: if(pressed, sub(dy,mouse.stagey,sy);add(ny,cy,dy);Math.max(ny,0); copy(th,layer[scrollbarg].pixelheight);sub(th,layer[scrollsliderg].pixelheight);Math.min(ny,th); copy(y,ny); div(ny,th); copy(fh,layer[textscrollerg].hoverflow); mul(fh,-1); mul(ny,fh); layer[textscrollerg].stopscrolling(); copy(layer[textscrollerg].y,ny); delayedcall(0,dragging()); );

layer.name: module2img
layer.onclick: tween(layer[timer].alpha,0,1); tween(layer[menubg].x,-135,0.5); set (layer[classificationbox].visible, true); set (layer[buildingcon].visible, true); delayedcall(1, set(layer[classificationbox].status, 0); tween(layer[classificationbox].x, -494, 1);); set(autorotate.enabled, false); loadscene(m2s1,null,MERGE,BLEND(1));

layer.name: module2name
layer.onclick: tween(layer[timer].alpha,0,1); tween(layer[menubg].x,-135,0.5); set (layer[classificationbox].visible, true); set (layer[buildingcon].visible, true); delayedcall(1, set(layer[classificationbox].status, 0); tween(layer[classificationbox].x, -494, 1);); set(autorotate.enabled, false); loadscene(m2s1,null,MERGE,BLEND(1));

layer.name: module3img
layer.onclick: tween(layer[timer].alpha,1,1); countdown(31); tween(layer[menubg].x,-135,0.5); set(tong,0); set(noquest,4); set(layer[classificationbox].visible, false); set(layer[buildingcon].visible, true); set(autorotate.enabled, false); loadscene(m2s5,null,MERGE,BLEND(1));

layer.name: module3name
layer.onclick: tween(layer[timer].alpha,1,1); countdown(31); tween(layer[menubg].x,-135,0.5); set(tong,0); set(noquest,4); set(layer[classificationbox].visible, false); set(layer[buildingcon].visible, true); set(autorotate.enabled, false); loadscene(m2s5,null,MERGE,BLEND(1));

layer.name: zoomimg
layer.onclick: if(status == 0, set(status, 1); set(crop,'0|200|200|200');, set(status, 0); set(crop,'0|0|200|200');); switch(fullscreen);

layer.name: rotationimg
layer.onclick: if(status == 0, set(status, 1); set(crop,'200|200|200|200');, set(status, 0); set(crop,'200|0|200|200');); switch(autorotate.enabled);

layer.name: volumeimg
layer.onclick: if(status == 0, set(status, 1); set(crop,'400|200|200|200'); resumesound(questionvideo);, set(status, 0); set(crop,'400|0|200|200'); pausesound(questionvideo););

layer.name: scrollslidersearch
layer.dragging: if(pressed, sub(dy,mouse.stagey,sy);add(ny,cy,dy);Math.max(ny,0); copy(th,layer[scrollbarsearch].pixelheight);sub(th,layer[scrollslidersearch].pixelheight);Math.min(ny,th); copy(y,ny); div(ny,th); copy(fh,layer[textscrollersearch].hoverflow); mul(fh,-1); mul(ny,fh); layer[textscrollersearch].stopscrolling(); copy(layer[textscrollersearch].y,ny); delayedcall(0,dragging()); );

plugin.name: desoutput
plugin.html: A worker used a mobile scaffold to carry cut finishing works of the 1st floor dampa ceiling. Bracings for positioning the mobile scaffold is broken causing the movement of scaffold when worker is finishing the exterior window at 1st floor. Consequently, worker lost his balance and fell to his injury from mobile scaffold.

layer.name: scrollsliderdes
layer.dragging: if(pressed, sub(dy,mouse.stagey,sy);add(ny,cy,dy);Math.max(ny,0); copy(th,layer[scrollbardes].pixelheight);sub(th,layer[scrollsliderdes].pixelheight);Math.min(ny,th); copy(y,ny); div(ny,th); copy(fh,layer[textscrollerdes].hoverflow); mul(fh,-1); mul(ny,fh); layer[textscrollerdes].stopscrolling(); copy(layer[textscrollerdes].y,ny); delayedcall(0,dragging()); );

plugin.name: causeoutput
plugin.html: - Unsafe structure of scaffold (bracings is broken)[/br] - Lack of inspection of the whole scaffold structure conducted by competent examiner before use[/br] - Lack of the personal fall arrest system (body harness)

layer.name: scrollslidercause
layer.dragging: if(pressed, sub(dy,mouse.stagey,sy);add(ny,cy,dy);Math.max(ny,0); copy(th,layer[scrollbarcause].pixelheight);sub(th,layer[scrollslidercause].pixelheight);Math.min(ny,th); copy(y,ny); div(ny,th); copy(fh,layer[textscrollercause].hoverflow); mul(fh,-1); mul(ny,fh); layer[textscrollercause].stopscrolling(); copy(layer[textscrollercause].y,ny); delayedcall(0,dragging()); );

plugin.name: methodoutput
plugin.html: - Secure the mobile scaffold with safe bracings[/br] - Inspect the scaffold to ensure safety before work[/br] - Use the body harness to protect falling from mobile scaffold[/br] - Participate safety training and possess a valid certificate

layer.name: scrollslidermethod
layer.dragging: if(pressed, sub(dy,mouse.stagey,sy);add(ny,cy,dy);Math.max(ny,0); copy(th,layer[scrollbarmethod].pixelheight);sub(th,layer[scrollslidermethod].pixelheight);Math.min(ny,th); copy(y,ny); div(ny,th); copy(fh,layer[textscrollermethod].hoverflow); mul(fh,-1); mul(ny,fh); layer[textscrollermethod].stopscrolling(); copy(layer[textscrollermethod].y,ny); delayedcall(0,dragging()); );

layer.name: stdname1
layer.css: text-align:left; color:#0505fc; font-family:Tahoma; font-size:12px; font-weight:normal; font-style:italic; text-decoration:underline;

layer.name: typename2
layer.css: text-align:left; color:#0505fc; font-family:Tahoma; font-size:12px; font-weight:normal; font-style:italic; text-decoration:underline;

layer.name: typename3
layer.css: text-align:left; color:#0505fc; font-family:Tahoma; font-size:12px; font-weight:normal; font-style:italic; text-decoration:underline;

krpano.action: if(%1 == should, set(layer[methodoutput].html, " - Secure the mobile scaffold with safe bracings[/br] - Inspect the scaffold to ensure safety before work[/br] - Use the body harness to protect falling from mobile scaffold[/br] - Participate safety training and possess a valid certificate"); set(layer[shouldbg].bgcolor,0x3b506c); set(layer[shouldnbg].bgcolor,0x8d99aa); set(layer[foremanbg].bgcolor,0x8d99aa);); if(%1 == shouldn, set(layer[methodoutput].html, "- Continue working if the mobile scaffold is not secured correctly[/br] - Continue working without using body harness[/br] - Overstretch the body from the working platform of scaffold"); set(layer[shouldbg].bgcolor,0x8d99aa); set(layer[shouldnbg].bgcolor,0x3b506c); set(layer[foremanbg].bgcolor,0x8d99aa);); if(%1 == foreman, set(layer[methodoutput].html, "- Provide body harness for workers who work at height[/br] - Ensure the mobile scaffold assembled by competent workers[/br] - Inspect the scaffold before allowing workers to work[/br] - Provide adequate safety training for workers"); set(layer[shouldbg].bgcolor,0x8d99aa); set(layer[shouldnbg].bgcolor,0x8d99aa); set(layer[foremanbg].bgcolor,0x3b506c););

layer.name: answerx
layer.onclick: add(tong,5); set(crop, '0|0|100|95'); set(hotspot[get(currenthot)].step, 2); set(layer[textquestionbg1].visible, false); set(layer[textquestionbg2].visible, true); tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,0,1););

layer.name: answera
layer.onclick: if(result == 1, add(tong,5); set(crop, '0|0|100|95'); tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,0,1)); set(hotspot[get(currenthot)].step, 3); set(layer[textquestioncon].visible, false); if(typeq != 2, sub(noquest,1); delayedcall(2, removehotspot(get(currenthot)););, set(layer[analysisbox].visible, true);); , sub(tong,1); set(crop, '100|0|100|95'); tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,0,1););); if(noquest == 0, hienfinalresult(););

layer.name: answerb
layer.onclick: if(result == 2, add(tong,5); set(crop, '0|0|100|95'); tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,0,1);); set(hotspot[get(currenthot)].step, 3); set(layer[textquestioncon].visible, false); if(typeq != 2, sub(noquest,1); delayedcall(2, removehotspot(get(currenthot)););, set(layer[analysisbox].visible, true);); , sub(tong,1); set(crop, '100|0|100|95'); tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,0,1););); if(noquest == 0, hienfinalresult(););

layer.name: answerc
layer.onclick: if(result == 3, add(tong,5); set(crop, '0|0|100|95'); tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,0,1);); set(hotspot[get(currenthot)].step, 3); set(layer[textquestioncon].visible, false); if(typeq != 2, sub(noquest,1); delayedcall(2, removehotspot(get(currenthot)););, set(layer[analysisbox].visible, true);); , sub(tong,1); set(crop, '100|0|100|95'); tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,0,1););); if(noquest == 0, hienfinalresult(););

layer.name: answerd
layer.onclick: if(result == 4, add(tong,5); set(crop, '0|0|100|95'); tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[rightanswer].alpha,0,1);); set(hotspot[get(currenthot)].step, 3); set(layer[textquestioncon].visible, false); if(typeq != 2, sub(noquest,1); delayedcall(2, removehotspot(get(currenthot)););, set(layer[analysisbox].visible, true);); , sub(tong,1); set(crop, '100|0|100|95'); tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,1,1); delayedcall(2, tween(layer[wronganswer].alpha,0,1););); if(noquest == 0, hienfinalresult(););

plugin.name: desaoutput
plugin.html: A worker used a temporary ladder to install a new light in an office. However, he fixed the ladder bracings carelessly. Consequently, the worker lost his balance, fell and suffered an injury.

layer.name: scrollsliderdesa
layer.dragging: if(pressed, sub(dy,mouse.stagey,sy);add(ny,cy,dy);Math.max(ny,0); copy(th,layer[scrollbardesa].pixelheight);sub(th,layer[scrollsliderdesa].pixelheight);Math.min(ny,th); copy(y,ny); div(ny,th); copy(fh,layer[textscrollerdesa].hoverflow); mul(fh,-1); mul(ny,fh); layer[textscrollerdesa].stopscrolling(); copy(layer[textscrollerdesa].y,ny); delayedcall(0,dragging()); );

layer.name: answertextr4
layer.html: Lack of ladder inspection before work by competent supervisor

layer.html: Key steps for safe work practice

layer.name: answertextk1
layer.html: Provide safety training for workers to possess a valid certificate

layer.name: answertextk3
layer.html: Inspect comprehensively the working platform before use

layer.name: answertextk4
layer.html: Use mobile scaffold instead of temporary ladder
